name: TunnelPuzzle for Minnhax
description:
Blind Bounce is a prototype (very early) of a puzzle game.

The goal is to use a projectile ball and monitor it's entry and exit points to try to figure out which tiles belong in which place.

  • Move left and right with the arrow keys
  • Fire the ball with left mouse
  • Drag tiles from the right onto the grid with right mouse

Thanks for checking out the idea.

Future additions:

  • More levels / tiles
  • A timer
  • Lives / guess counter & scoring system
  • Better visuals
  • Limits on number of projectiles
